tool_description: Our WebService API lets you store QR Code & short URLs in our database.
name: QR Code management
title: QR Code management

api_list.name: Retrieve a Live URL
Retrieve a QR Code
Retrieve all QR Codes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unitag-management-api.p.rapidapi.com/qrcodes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unitag-management-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://unitag-management-api.p.rapidapi.com/qrcodes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unitag-management-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Check hash availability
api_list.description: This endpoint allows to check the availability of a given hash. This hash can then be used to create a Live URL of the following form: http://opn.to/a/{hash}.

required_parameters.name: hash
required_parameters.description: Hash for which the availability is to be tested
